articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: How older Americans show us the vaccines work - CNN
articles.description: When we zoom in on those aged 65 & older, the decline is even more dramatic. They were 83% of all Covid related deaths in December 2020. In preliminary June data, they were just 65%... Nearly four-fifths (78%) of this group have been fully vaccinated.
